Technology Consultant - Professional ServicesJob Description:

At Micro Focus, everything we do is based on a simple idea: The fastest way to get results is to build on what you have. Our software solutions enable organizations to do just that. Secure and scalable, with analytics built in, they bridge the gap between existing and emerging ITfast-tracking digital transformations across DevOps, Hybrid IT, Security, and Predictive Analytics. In the race to innovate, Micro Focus customers have the clear advantage. Our portfolio spans the following areas: DevOps | IT Operations| Cloud | Security | Info Governance | Big Data, Machine Learning, & Analytics

Micro Focus Professional Services Organization provides technical consulting and implementation expertise to Micro Focus customers across Europe. In the role of Technology Consultant you will be responsible for providing technology consulting to external customers and internal project teams. You will be focusing in providing technical support in the creation and delivery of ITIL compliant technology solutions designed to meet customers unique business needs. As trusted advisor you need to be able to create and maintain effective customer relationships resulting into high level of customer satisfaction. Maintaining knowledge of leading edge software technologies and industry domain knowledge is key.

Furthermore, you will actively contribute to the companys solutions portfolio by providing information ranging from technical knowledge to methodologies based on experience gained from customer projects. You have will the opportunity to shape technical direction and technical strategies within the organization and for external customers.

Responsibilities:

Responsible for implementing part or all of the technical solution to the client by adhering to an agreed technical design. Occasionally responsible for providing a detailed technical design for enterprise solutions. Understands a broad spectrum of Micro Focus technology in order to provide part or all of a detailed technical design which meets customer requirements. Often leads small to medium technical projects. Works with and under the direction of the Project/Technical Manager and with customer nominated representatives. Liaises with Solutions Architect as appropriate. Tasks may include installing new systems applications; updating applications, creating boundaries for as well as performing configuration and testing activities; applications programming for assigned modules within a larger program; assisting in the preparation of technical presentations and demonstrations; and participating in customer meetings.Provides technical support and input on the application of technology to a defined business segment. Provides advice on solution and integration opportunities to defined segments.Provides hands on expertise on specific integration activities that are part of an engagement. Provides planning and design support for the development of solution architectures that will be implemented in a multiple system environment. Communicates across client community, and is viewed as adding value. Demonstrates execution of the Micro Focus strategy. Uses knowledge tools and re- uses information for the benefit of projects, and of professional development.

Your profile:

Masters or Bachelors Degree (or equivalent) in Software Engineering or other IT related discipline 2-6 years of experience in a similar roleExcellent French and English language communication skills, both written and verbal Strong team skills and achieve together mindset Customer focused attitude and ability to work as part of a global team Excellent analytical and problem solving skills Experience in system administration of Unix or Windows systems Competence in scripting, e.g. in Perl, Unix Shell-Scripting or VBscript on Windows Good understanding of: web-servers, application servers, networking, firewalls, load balancing Experience with any Micro Focus products or with similar products in the market like Remedy/ARS or IBM Tivoli will be considered advantageous Passion of software and technology is a must!

Additional skills will be considered as a plus:

Understanding of the IT Infrastructure Library (ITIL) Standard Software design and development experience in Java or C++ Competence in Relational Databases, e.g. SQL-Language, MS-SQL or Oracle Administration

Training

On boarding successfully a new consultant is a core priority for our company. You should expect to receive a series of virtual and on the job training sessions. It will include basic training on processes, specific products and technology, followed by training-on-the-job where you will work on specific customer projects as part of a team with an assigned mentor to apply and develop your knowledge. Throughout your career with Micro Focus you will have international exposure and you will be able to grow your career according to your skills and aspirations.

TunisiaKeyrus Digital

 CDI
Chef de Projet Technique



 #Digital Commerce

Description du poste

Votre rôle s’étend de l’élaboration des spécifications techniques sur la base du cahier des charges (fonctionnel) jusqu’à la livraison du projet.
Rattaché au Pôle E-Commerce, vous dépendez à la fois du Directeur de Projet et du Directeur de la Production. Vos missions seront les suivantes :
Vous établissez les spécifications techniques d’après le cahier des charges du client, vous découpez son projet en tâches et vous évaluez les charges associées.
Vous affectez les ressources nécessaires au bon déroulement du projet et vous effectuez le suivi de leurs développements respectifs. Vous assurez ainsi le lien, entre les équipes techniques et le client.
Tout au long du projet, vous avez pour mission de contrôler la qualité technique des développements et de vérifier leur conformité aux spécifications fonctionnelles préalablement définies.
Enfin, vous réalisez et contrôlez la documentation technique et effectuez régulièrement des travaux de reporting.

Profil

Vous avez une expérience significative (3 années minimum) en gestion de projet.

Vous avez développé de réelles compétences techniques sur Java/J2EE, framework Spring et Tomcat.

Vous êtes diplômé d’un BAC+5 en informatique (Ecole d’ingénieur ou cursus universitaire).

Vous possédez de réelles capacités relationnelles, vous savez animer et coordonner une équipe, et votre adaptabilité et votre sens du service sont des atouts indispensables pour mener à bien vos missions.

Vous êtes organisé(e) et rigoureux (se), vous possédez de bonnes capacités d’analyse pour comprendre les problématiques métiers dans les contextes e-commerce.

Votre goût du challenge et votre expertise fonctionnelle et technique, au sein d’un environnement où vous pourrez exprimer et faire croître votre valeur, vous permettront d’optimiser votre carrière.

La connaissance des moteurs de recherche (Endeca, Google Commerce Search, Fred Hopper, Exalead, …), du CMS et des spécificités techniques du milieu du Web est un plus.

Si vous souhaitez rejoindre un groupe international, avec des équipes multiculturelles, où le sens du service et l’esprit d’initiative sont moteurs dans la réussite des projets, alors rejoignez nous !

At Vistaprint, we believe that everything we do has a lasting impact on our customers and on each other. It begins and ends with a passion for helping our customers succeed. To give them our best, we empower our team with the autonomy they need to make smarter decisions and pursue higher value. We thrive on exploration, collaboration, and helping every customer grow their business beyond imagination. Fueled by technology and innovation, we are so much more than a call center.

Putting Your Expertise To Work

As a Senior Software Engineer, you will be a member of the Customer Experience team, responsible for identifying and executing opportunities for growth at Vistaprint. Through an agile, customer-focused, experiment-and-learn methodology, the team will target new opportunities to serve small businesses. Learn more about our journey at https://cx.vistaprint.com/

Essential Stack We're Using


C#, http://ASP.NET MVC, .NET CoreNUnit, NSubstitute, and SpecFlowReact, jQuery, Backbone.js, SASS, Mocha, Grunt, Node.jsContinuous integration and deployment with Jenkins, Artifactory, AWSEmerging microservices architectureNewRelic, SumoLogic (nice to have)


In Return You Will Bring

We’re looking for a variety of skill sets to bring into the team to complement each other. The roles will involve rapid prototyping and a mix of front and backend experience. All candidates should have a diverse technical background, entrepreneurial spirit, and a passion for innovation. Here’s what we expect to see on a resume:

2+ years of professional software developmentStrong knowledge of design patterns and good software engineering principlesAgile development using Scrum or KanbanCollaboration skills to effectively work with business partners, stakeholders and other technologists (locally and remotely)Strong verbal and written communication skills in English Attention to detail and a proactive mindset

What’s In It For You?

Work in a highly collaborative, self-organizing team + the ability to decide how your team works and what technologies you useBeing part of a Global team, daily collaboration with peers and stakeholders from Vistaprint locations around the globe (USA, Europe, …)Competitive salary + comprehensive benefitsFlexible working hoursContinuous development opportunities such as onsite training, meetups, conferences, and online training subscriptionsOnsite Gym roomOnsite game room (baby-foot, ping pong, Play-station)And more!

Equal Opportunity Employer

DevOps | IT Operations| Cloud | Security | Info Governance | Big Data, Machine Learning, & Analytics

Role Description

Micro Focus Professional Services Organization provides technical consulting and implementation expertise to Micro Focus customers across Europe. In the role of Junior Technology Consultant, you will be responsible in providing technology consulting to external customers and internal project teams. You will be focusing in providing technical support in the creation and delivery of ITIL compliant technology solutions designed to meet customers unique business needs. As trusted advisor you need to be able to create and maintain effective customer relationships resulting into high level of customer satisfaction. Maintaining knowledge of leading edge software technologies and industry domain knowledge is key.

Furthermore you will actively contribute to the companys solutions portfolio by providing information ranging from technical knowledge to methodologies based on experience gained from customer projects. You have will the opportunity to shape technical direction and technical strategies within the organization and for external customers.

Responsibilities

Responsible for implementing part or all of the technical solution to the client by adhering to an agreed technical design. Occasionally responsible for providing a detailed technical design for enterprise solutions. Understands a broad spectrum of Micro Focus technology in order to provide part or all of a detailed technical design which meets customer requirements. Often leads small to medium technical projects. Works with and under the direction of the Project/Technical Manager and with customer nominated representatives. Liaises with Solutions Architect as appropriate. Tasks may include installing new systems applications; updating applications, creating boundaries for as well as performing configuration and testing activities; applications programming for assigned modules within a larger program; assisting in the preparation of technical presentations and demonstrations; and participating in customer meetings.Provides technical support and input on the application of technology to a defined business segment. Provides planning and design support for the development of solution architectures that will be implemented in a multiple system environment. Communicates across client community, and is viewed as adding value. Demonstrates execution of the Micro Focus strategy. Uses knowledge tools and re- uses information for the benefit of projects, and of professional development.

Your profile

Masters or Bachelors Degree (or equivalent) in Software Engineering or other IT related discipline Ideally some experience in a similar roleExcellent French and English language communication skills, both written and verbal Strong team skills and achieve together mindset Customer focused attitude and ability to work as part of a global team Excellent analytical and problem solving skills Experience in system administration of Unix or Windows systems Competence in scripting, e.g. in Perl, Unix Shell-Scripting or VBscript on Windows Good understanding of: web-servers, application servers, networking, firewalls, load balancing Experience with any Micro Focus products or with similar products in the market like Remedy/ARS or IBM Tivoli will be considered advantageous Passion of software and technology is a must!

Additional skills will be considered as a plus:

Understanding of the IT Infrastructure Library (ITIL) Standard Software design and development experience in Java or C++ Competence in Relational Databases, e.g. SQL-Language, MS-SQL or Oracle Administration

Training

On boarding successfully a new consultant is a core priority for our company. You should expect to receive a series of virtual and on the job training sessions. It will include basic training on processes, specific products and technology, followed by training-on-the-job where you will work on specific customer projects as part of a team with an assigned mentor to apply and develop your knowledge. Throughout your career with Micro Focus you will have international exposure and you will be able to grow your career according to your skills and aspirations.

Ingénieur du développement Java (DSIF/ERIS)

Intégrer des équipes pilotées en mode Agile (Scrum) et participer aux cérémonies Agile.

Assurer les développements et garantir un haut niveau de qualité logicielle des composants développés.

Faire des conceptions logicielles et techniques et réaliser des POC.

Contribuer au développement logiciel des composants.

Contribuer la mise en œuvre des patterns d'architecture logicielle alignés sur les meilleures pratiques de l'état de l'art et sur les préconisations du groupe.

Participer aux chantiers DevOps

Travailler en équipe intégrée dans un objectif damélioration continue (revue de code, exploration technique, veille technologique, etc.).

Activités

Au quotidien, vous serez amenés :

Contribuer au développement des User Stories et des versions application.Participer aux cérémonies Agile (daily, grooming, rétrospective, etc.) des projets dans lesquels vous serez impliqués.Assurer la qualité de lapplication (Tests unitaires / Tests fonctionnels automatique)Encadrer les jeunes développeurs

 Developer, Engineer, Software Engineer, Java, Call Center, Technology, Engineering, Customer Service

Are you interested in joining a highly innovative organization with different culture? delivering products based on edge-cutting technologies and serving millions of customers?

Do you want to be part of a successful and widely recognized multi-location team?

o A team where every single new day is a new learning opportunity, for real?

o A team where Amazon Elastic Beanstalk is already legacy Infrastructure (and currently being deprecated)?

o A team where Continuous deployment, DevOps, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Cloudflare, New Relic and Pager Duty are areas where you improve your knowledge every day?

o A team where Pair-Programming, Github Pull requests and code reviews are everyone’s everyday responsibility?

o A team where real time feedback is an efficient recipe for both collective and personal growth?

o A team whose last team building happened in Paris?

Are you a fixer, someone who sees how software can be improved, measured, tested – someone who wants not only to build something, but continuously make it better?

Are you ready to think creatively to design innovative and robust frameworks that allow teams to assess the quality, reliability, and performance of their software?

Do you want to be part of a company offering best in class benefits? Including State-of-the-art gym, canteen, break/gaming area and free transportation?

You are the perfect candidate if you

Are a good team player, passionate about the entire Software Development Lifecycle – that means working together to design, develop, test, and maintain the products you build.

Are proficient in English with a university degree in computer science

Are a technical problem-solver - someone who understands how to triage software, and how to implement improvements to software that make debugging easy and transparent.

Have a solid understanding of how Object-Oriented programming (Java, C#) can be used to create effective, reliable, and accessible testing frameworks.

Vistaprint Digital is looking for passionate, skillful and talented software engineers with a particular focus in test infrastructure. So if you are up for challenge in a fast-paced, energetic, and constantly changing environment please apply now!

position: IT Desktop Support Engineer - Middle East & Africa
Job Description:
GENERAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES

• Provides desk-side assistance in resolving technology support issues.

• Builder of customer relationship and trust

• End User environment communications and trainings

• Uses effective listening skills to develop understanding of client questions or issues.

• Utilizes soft skills and troubleshooting skills to resolve client issues and questions.



Asks probing questions to gather relevant information on routine and complex calls.
Documents, tracks and monitors client incidents in ticketing system to ensure a timely resolution.
Prioritizes and escalates support incidents and requests based on business impact and documented guidelines.

• Regional point of contact for all IT related issues or requests (1st PoC being the Employee Support Helpdesk)

• Performs installations, repairs, upgrades, backups and other maintenance tasks.

• Installs, configures and troubleshoots desktop systems, workstations, servers and network issues in a heterogeneous environment.

• Deploy (as per current standard), Configure, Deliver, Dispose

• Deployment of new applications (and/or upgrades) and follow up

• Review Unauthorized and End of Life Software and remediate

• Microsoft Windows patching (Desktop OS)

• Non Windows Desktop OS patching (e.g. Mac OS)

• Applications patching (e.g. Java, Adobe Flash)

• Support and Repair (liaise with vendor for hardware repair)

• Maintain an up to day inventory (e.g. HPAM update upon deployment or disposal)

• Hardware and Software assets management (related to End User)
Maintains passwords, data integrity and file system security for the desktop environment.
Communicates highly technical information to both technical and nontechnical personnel.
Recommends solutions including new acquisitions and upgrades.
May participate in development of information technology and infrastructure projects.
May have expertise in commonly used business applications.

• Create/Update documentation related end users (e.g. Welcome email, joiner/leaver check lists)

• Meeting Room Health Check (e.g. ensure IT related equipment are properly functioning)

IT Representative - Jumia (Full Time)Jumia is the leading pan-Africa e-commerce platform. We are looking for talented people with a passion for Africa to join our team and embark on our exciting journey!

Description de loffre

ip-label est éditeur de solutions de monitoring de l'expérience utilisateur. Nos robots vérifient la disponibilité et mesurent la performance des services numériques de nos clients (sites web, applications, streaming...).

Dans le cadre de nos nouveaux projets, nous renforçons nos équipes de développement.

Vous serez amené contribuer plusieurs projets :

Les solutions de monitoring actif (Synthetic Monitoring) travers le pilotage des terminaux mobiles physiques ou virtuels (iOS et Android), afin de reproduire le comportement des utilisateurs réels et valider la disponibilté et la performance des apps mobiles de nos clients (Python, .Net, C#, Appium, Bash, …),
Vous participerez également la création d'applications natives permettant nos clients de consulter l'état de leurs services tel que mesuré par nos outils de monitoring. (Swift, Kotlin)

Connaissances souhaitées

Vous avez au moins 5 ans dexpérience dans le domaine du développement mobile.
Vous êtes rigoureux (se), organisé(e) et force de proposition.
Vous maîtrisez le développement dapplications mobiles sous iOS natif et/ou Android natif (Java ou Kotlin),
Vous avez déj réalisé plusieurs applications disponibles sous Google Play / Apple Appstore,
Vous êtes familier des technologies web services REST,
Idéalement vous connaissez C#, Python et PHP
Vous avez déj utilisé des SDK de danalytics ou de troubleshooting mobile (Google Analytics, Flurry, Crashlytics, Fabric...)
Vous êtes sensible l'expérience utilisateur et êtes force de proposition concernant lUX Design de nos produits

Idéalement vous connaissez tout ou partie de nos outils de travail : SCRUM, Gitlab, Jenkins, AWS

Profil

Diplômé(e) d'un Bac+5 (université ou école dingénieur) ou expérience permettant de justifier une équivalence ingénieur, vous avez au moins 5 ans dexpérience en développement. Créatif, rigoureux et autonome, les défis techniques ne vous font pas peur et vous êtes sensibles lexpérience utilisateur et exigeant quant la qualité perçue par nos clients.

Pourquoi ip-label ?

Si vous êtes motivés par la découverte de notre métier mais que vous pensez qu'il vous manque certaines connaissances, venez en parler avec nous.

Rejoignez-nous pour devenir un expert de la qualité d'expérience utilisateur.

Localisation : Tunis

Salaire : selon expérience

Niveau d'expérience requis dans le poste : 5 ans minimum

Type de contrat : CDI

Wir suchen ab sofort für imbus Tunesien in SousseSoftware Entwickler (w/m/d) Scala/Java 

Ihr Platz in der imbus-Welt

Als enthusiastischer Software Entwickler (w/m/d) Scala/Java tragen Sie in unserem agilen Team aktiv zur Weiterentwicklung der TestBench bei.Sie arbeiten mit beim testgetriebenen Umsetzen von User Stories auf Basis von Scala.Dazu analysieren Sie bestehenden Java-Code.Sie sammeln Wissen und geben dieses weiter beim Pair Programming, in Blog-Beiträgen, auf Konferenzen oder in Open-Source-Projekten.Sie leben die Clean-Code-Philosophie.Das Aufspüren, Formulieren und Analysieren von User Stories, um die TestBench weiter voranzubringen rundet Ihr Aufgabengebiet ab.

Das bringen Sie mit

Sie verfügen über solide IT-Kenntnisse auf Basis eines abgeschlossenen Studiums der Informatik oder einer vergleichbaren Ausbildung.Sie haben mindestens 3 Jahre Programmiererfahrung, fundierte Kenntnisse in der Java-Programmierung und erste Erfahrungen in Scala.Moderne Technologien wecken Ihre Begeisterung.Von Vorteil sind Kenntnisse oder erste Erfahrungen zu Slick, Akka und Play sowie mit Open Source Projekten und mit der Entwicklung unter Linux.Neben sehr guten Deutsch-, Französisch- und Arabisch-Kenntnissen verfügen Sie auch über eine gute Kenntnis der Tunesischen Kultur und Mentalität.Ihre Arbeitsweise zeichnet sich durch Teamfähigkeit gepaart mit selbständigem und verantwortungsvollem Arbeiten aus.Sie bringen die Bereitschaft zu ständiger persönlicher Weiterentwicklung mit.

So sieht die imbus-Welt aus

Unsere Welt gründet auf den Werten Exzellenz, Nachhaltigkeit und Freude.Alle imbus-Testexperten qualifizieren sich als ISTQB® Certified Tester.Wir leben Transparenz durch monatliche Vollversammlungen, einfache Prozesse und eine Politik der offenen Türen.Flexible Arbeitszeiten und Arbeitszeitmodelle tragen dazu bei, dass Ihre Arbeit zu Ihren aktuellen Lebensumständen passt.Für uns bedeutet Arbeiten auch: Spaß haben, neue Freunde kennenlernen und gemeinsam Feste feiern.

Entfalten Sie Ihr Potenzial als Software Entwickler (w/m/d) Scala/Java in einem stark wachsenden Unternehmen, das durch flache Hierarchien viele Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten bietet.

Zögern Sie nicht und senden Sie uns Ihre vollständigen Bewerbungsunterlagen im PDF-Format mit Angabe Ihres frühesten Eintrittstermins und Ihrer Gehaltsvorstellung an:

position: Ingénieur de développement full stack Java-AngularJS (DSIF/TETRIS)
Job Description:
Dans le cadre de projet SI dOrange considéré de grande envergure, et au sein dune équipe AGILE, vous aurez pour mission principale la participation aux phases danalyse, de conception, de développement et de tests dans le cadre de la réalisation ou du pilotage de projets informatiques. Votre rôle est de participer au processus de développement en respectant les besoins et les contraintes du client.

Vous serez en interaction permanente avec les différents intervenants de léquipe projet en local et linternational.

Les activités principales :

Analyser les propositions de solutions fonctionnelles et techniques, issues de la phase d'étude.Appréhender le besoin décrit dans les spécifications techniques ou users stories rédigés.Contribuer la rédaction des spécifications fonctionnelles et techniquesRédiger les livrables techniques suite aux recommandations du Team Leader.Réaliser la conception et le développement des applications dans des environnements techniques et fonctionnels riches et variés.Travailler en collaboration étroite avec les experts fonctionnels MOE, MOAAssurer la qualification et les tests croisés et de non régression des composants développés.Analyser les résultats issus de la vérification continue de la qualité du code.Participer aux cérémonies Scrum des projets (Demo, Daily meeting).Contribuer au chiffrage des tâches.Assurer un reporting régulier au Responsable du projetMettre en œuvre loutillage de gestion de configuration, dintégration continue,Préparer des solutions pour industrialiser et automatiser les opérations régulières : build, test, audit de code.Apporter le support la mise en production.Assurer les livraisons clients et répondre leurs sollicitations de soutiens en cas de besoin.Contribuer aux phases de dintégration dans lenvironnement DevOps (Intégration continue, déploiement automatique) et de livraison.


Ingénieur de développement full stack Java-AngularJS (DSIF/TETRIS)

GENERAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES



Analyzes, designs, programs, debugs and modifies software enhancements and/or new products used in local, networked or Internet-related computer programs. (Code must be used in core version of applications available for sale commercially.)
Interacts with product managers and/or users to define system requirements and/or necessary modifications.
Participates in software design meetings and analyzes user needs to determine technical requirements.
Write technical specifications based on conceptual design and stated business requirements.
Writes code, completes programming and performs testing and debugging of applications using current programming languages and technologies.
Completes documentation and procedures for installation and maintenance.
Trains and communicates with internal Client Training, Client Relationship and Sales teams on systems application.
May be responsible for developing or executing project plans, budgets and schedules and for documenting work and results.
May deliver informational and decision-seeking presentations to technical and business groups to internal and/or external audiences.
Other related duties assigned as needed.

EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS

A Bachelor’s degree in computer engineering, computer science or other related discipline or the equivalent combination of education, training, or work experience.

GENERAL KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS & ABILITIES

Knowledge of FIS products and services; in-depth knowledge of products and services in assigned line(s) of business
Knowledge of financial services industry
Knowledge of end-to-end systems development life cycles, e.g., waterfall, iterative and other modern approaches to software development
Knowledge of standards relevant to the software industry , e.g., ISO, CMM, Six Sigma
Knowledge of banking practices, regulations and operations within assigned line(s) of business
In-depth understanding of design patterns and their application
Fluency in developing and understanding sequence diagrams, class models, etc.
Proficiency in solutions design and requirements definition disciplines leveraging model driven design based tools and techniques including conceptual solution component models, business process models, use cases, etc.
Outstanding verbal and written communication skills to technical and non-technical audiences of various levels in the organization, e.g., executive, management, individual contributors
Excellent analytical, decision-making, problem-solving, team and time management skills
Ability to persuade and influence others on the best approach to take
Ability to estimate work effort for project sub-plans or small projects and ensure the project is successfully completed
Positive outlook, strong work ethic, and responsive to internal and external clients and contacts
Willingly and successfully fulfills the role of teacher, mentor and coach
May require in-depth knowledge of networking, computing platform, storage, database, security, middleware, network and systems management and related infrastructure technologies and practices

FIS JOB LEVEL DESCRIPTION

Advanced professional role. Requires a broad knowledge of the system development life cycle; products, services, practices, regulations and operations associated with the assigned line(s) of business; and software engineering alternatives. Requires proficiency in at least two higher-level programming languages. Evaluates systems specifications for complex business requirements, develops and prepares computer-based solutions. Analyzes problems in terms of detailed equipment requirements and capabilities, including those related to scalable applications, and cloud-based resources. Verifies program logic by preparing test data for trial runs. Receives general supervision and is competent to work at the highest level of all technical phases of software engineering while working on own or in a team environment most of the time. May be involved in providing assistance and training to lower level software engineers. Typically requires seven or more years software engineering work experience.

Dans le cadre des projets de développement, vous interviendrez dans toutes les phases du projet de létude, la conception techniques puis la réalisation, jusquau déploiement sur les différents environnements. Vous aurez pour objectif dassurer la maintenance dun parc dapplications.

Dans ce cadre, vous serez amené :

Participer la rédaction des documentations initiales (spécifications techniques).Participer aux études concernant des évolutions applicatives et assurer la conception technique.Chiffrer des solutions.Proposer des solutions techniques.Développer des modules constituant une application Web.Élaborer des tests unitaires.Déployer la solution sur la plateforme cible.

Junior Technology Consultant - Professional ServicesJob Description:

At Micro Focus, everything we do is based on a simple idea: The fastest way to get results is to build on what you have. Our software solutions enable organizations to do just that. Secure and scalable, with analytics built in, they bridge the gap between existing and emerging ITfast-tracking digital transformations across DevOps, Hybrid IT, Security, and Predictive Analytics. In the race to innovate, Micro Focus customers have the clear advantage. Our portfolio spans the following areas:

DevOps | IT Operations| Cloud | Security | Info Governance | Big Data, Machine Learning, & Analytics

Role Description

Micro Focus Professional Services Organization provides technical consulting and implementation expertise to Micro Focus customers across Europe. In the role of Junior Technology Consultant, you will be responsible in providing technology consulting to external customers and internal project teams. You will be focusing in providing technical support in the creation and delivery of ITIL compliant technology solutions designed to meet customers unique business needs. As trusted advisor you need to be able to create and maintain effective customer relationships resulting into high level of customer satisfaction. Maintaining knowledge of leading edge software technologies and industry domain knowledge is key.

Furthermore you will actively contribute to the companys solutions portfolio by providing information ranging from technical knowledge to methodologies based on experience gained from customer projects. You have will the opportunity to shape technical direction and technical strategies within the organization and for external customers.

Responsibilities

Responsible for implementing part or all of the technical solution to the client by adhering to an agreed technical design. Occasionally responsible for providing a detailed technical design for enterprise solutions. Understands a broad spectrum of Micro Focus technology in order to provide part or all of a detailed technical design which meets customer requirements. Often leads small to medium technical projects. Works with and under the direction of the Project/Technical Manager and with customer nominated representatives. Liaises with Solutions Architect as appropriate. Tasks may include installing new systems applications; updating applications, creating boundaries for as well as performing configuration and testing activities; applications programming for assigned modules within a larger program; assisting in the preparation of technical presentations and demonstrations; and participating in customer meetings.Provides technical support and input on the application of technology to a defined business segment. Provides advice on solution and integration opportunities to defined segments. Provides hands on expertise on specific integration activities that are part of an engagement. Provides planning and design support for the development of solution architectures that will be implemented in a multiple system environment. Communicates across client community, and is viewed as adding value. Demonstrates execution of the Micro Focus strategy. Uses knowledge tools and re- uses information for the benefit of projects, and of professional development.

Your profile

Masters or Bachelors Degree (or equivalent) in Software Engineering or other IT related discipline Ideally some experience in a similar roleExcellent French and English language communication skills, both written and verbal Strong team skills and achieve together mindset Customer focused attitude and ability to work as part of a global team Excellent analytical and problem solving skills Experience in system administration of Unix or Windows systems Competence in scripting, e.g. in Perl, Unix Shell-Scripting or VBscript on Windows Good understanding of: web-servers, application servers, networking, firewalls, load balancing Experience with any Micro Focus products or with similar products in the market like Remedy/ARS or IBM Tivoli will be considered advantageous Passion of software and technology is a must!

Additional skills will be considered as a plus:

Understanding of the IT Infrastructure Library (ITIL) Standard Software design and development experience in Java or C++ Competence in Relational Databases, e.g. SQL-Language, MS-SQL or Oracle Administration

Training

On boarding successfully a new consultant is a core priority for our company. You should expect to receive a series of virtual and on the job training sessions. It will include basic training on processes, specific products and technology, followed by training-on-the-job where you will work on specific customer projects as part of a team with an assigned mentor to apply and develop your knowledge. Throughout your career with Micro Focus you will have international exposure and you will be able to grow your career according to your skills and aspirations.

Java Developer - Jumia (Full Time)Jumia is the leading pan-Africa e-commerce platform. Founded in 2012, Jumia’s mission is to improve the quality of everyday life in Africa by leveraging technology to deliver innovative, convenient and affordable online services to consumers, while helping businesses grow as they use our platform to reach and serve consumers.

Our platforms consist of our marketplace, which connects sellers with consumers, our logistics service, which enables the shipment and delivery of packages from sellers to consumers, and our payment service, which facilitates transactions among participants active on our platform in selected markets. Through our online platforms, consumers can access a wide range of physical and digital goods and services, fashion, electronics, beauty products and also hotel and flight bookings or restaurant delivery.

With over 3,000 employees in 14 countries spanning across 6 African regions, Jumia is led by top talented leaders offering a great mix of local and international talents and is backed by very high-profile shareholders. Jumia is committed to creating sustainable impact for Africa. Jumia offers unique opportunities in a vibrant and booming environment, creating new jobs, new skills, and empowering a new generation. We are looking for talented people with a passion for Africa to join our team and embark on our exciting journey!

Main Responsibilities:

Design and implementation of web-based back-end components that are high-performing and scalable;Participate and improve development processes such as Agile, Scrum and Kanban along with strong robust coordination processes related to software release, deployment and testing.

Requirements:

Excellent knowledge in Data Structure and Algorithms;Relevant experience in Java/J2EE development with Spring framework, especially with modules such as Web, JMS, Transactions with Core Container;Strong experience with Maven;Strong experience with ORM (Hibernate) and SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL);A strong sense for code quality, following/defining coding guidelines and experience with Unit-Testing and SonarQube;Experience working with a large code-base and version systems, ideally GIT;Pro-activeness, team player and positive attitude;Adaptable, meticulous, innovative with good problem solving skills; Excellent English skills.

We offer:

A unique experience in an entrepreneurial, yet structured environment;The opportunity to become part of a highly professional and dynamic team working around the world;An unparalleled personal and professional growth as our longer-term objective is to train the next generation of leaders for our future internet ventures.
